name: The Nameless Cyborg
description:
Made for the GMC Jam 8.

The game is not completed (and WIP obviously because the idea, was really cool). It's really really upsetting to get only one level working.

Enjoy the only level!

Programming: Sahaun

Art : Bastian



Controls:

Movement: WASD/ Arrow

Aim : Mouse

Fire: Mouse Left Button
